verbose_text: XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR We explored the mechanism directly by mixing equal amounts of the WT and p.Ser62Leu CDK8 constructs and measuring STAT1 phosphorylation, but the observed reduction in phosphorylation in mixed samples did not obviously deviate from a linear response (data not shown); hence, further experiments will be required to support or refute the dominant negative hypothesis.
